metadata.name: Fragmented #3
metadata.description:
“Fragmented” is a series inspired by a plate from my wife's late mother, Barbara. It broke in late 2020 and sat on our kitchen island for a few months because. I started to think about stories that could be told beyond the borders of the broken piece.

I moved the fragment to my studio where it stayed on an empty sheet of paper for weeks.

One day, I picked up a pen and started working on "Fragmented", exploring the possibilities of things broken and the stories that can evolve from them.
